```{r init-example, message = FALSE}
library(corrr)
n <- 6
d <- data.frame(
       gender = sample(c("male", "female"), n, replace = TRUE),
       age    = rnorm(n, mean = 50,  sd = 20),
       iq     = rnorm(n, mean = 100, sd = 15)
     )

# Randomly add missing values
d$gender[sample(1:n, n / 5)] <- NA
d$age[sample(1:n, n / 5)]    <- NA
d$iq[sample(1:n, n / 5)]     <- NA
sapply(d, function(col) sum(is.na(col)))  # Count of NA in each colum

d

fashion(d)
```
